content.text: Hi, what's up?
Hey, not much. Just getting ready for work.
Cool, me too. I just graduated from high school last week.
Oh, congratulations! What are you planning to do next?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to college, but I'm also considering taking a year off.
Well, whatever you decide, I'm sure you'll do great.
Thanks, I appreciate that. What do you do for work?
I'm a truck driver. I drive all over the country delivering goods.
That sounds like a really cool job. I've always been fascinated by trucks.
It is pretty cool. I get to see a lot of different places.
I bet. Do you have any pets?
Yeah, I have a dog named Zoey. She's a golden retriever.
Aww, I love golden retrievers. They're so cute.
They are. She's the best dog in the world.
I bet. I love dogs. I have two dogs of my own. They're a Jack Russell Terrier and a Labrador Retriever.
Oh, nice. I love both of those breeds.
Yeah, they're great dogs. They're both really good with kids.
That's good to hear. I have a son who's 8 years old.
Oh, cool. I'm sure he loves the dogs.
Yeah, he does. They're his best friends.
That's so sweet. I love hearing about people who love their pets.
Yeah, I love my dogs more than anything in the world.
I know how you feel. I love my dogs like they're my children
